pages.title: Upmarket Trimming
pages.text: By imbuing the natural energy of a $(item)Fey Crafter$() into some mundane $(item)Shears with $(item)Runestone$(), you get a magically attuned pair which can fundamentally alter some materials as they are harvested. This allows you to obtain a couple of new herbs. For now, the most important is the $(item)Spirit Herb$().
